name: ProjectSpidey_0.02
description:
Since the previous version I made a cartoon-like cel-shaded look. I added a loading screen, and a UI, so the player can configure the graphics and the controls. I remade the spidey model and created new animations using animation rigging. I also revisited a huge part of the code and made a lot of fixes and simplifications.

Until next time, hang in there! (Or I mean... the webline... nevermind.)
